      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 3 - Leisure Time</string>
            <string language="en">Part 3 - Leisure Time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 3 - Freizeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 3 - Temps Libre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 3 - Tempo De Lazer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 3 - Tempo libero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 3 - ελεύθερος χρόνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 3 - Tiempo Libre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">What do you like to do? What are your hobbies and interests? Here you learn words, phrases and expressions to help you talk about what you do, or would like to do, in your leisure time.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">What do you like to do? What åre your hobbies and interests? Here you learn words, phrases and expressions to help you talk about what you do, or would like to do, in your leisure time. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">family</string>
            <string language="sv">feelings</string>
            <string language="sv">leisure</string>
            <string language="sv">activities</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">party</string>
            <string language="sv">café</string>
            <string language="sv">time expressions</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">feelings</string>
            <string language="en">leisure</string>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">party</string>
            <string language="en">cafe</string>
            <string language="en">time expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was Sie mögen tun? Welches åre Ihre 
Liebhabereien und Interessen? Hier erlernen Sie Wörter, Phrasen
und Ausdrücke, um mit Ihnen zu helfen, sich zu befassen was Sie tun, 
oder möchten, in Ihrer Freizeit tun. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que aimez-vous faire ? Quel åre vos 
passe-temps et intérêts ? Voici que vous apprenez des mots, 
des expressions et des expressions pour vous aider à parler de ce que
vous faites, ou les voudriez faire, dans votre temps libre. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les débutants - module 5 -
qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que  você gosta de fazer? Que åre seus 
passatempos e interesses? Aqui você aprende palavras, frases e 
expressões ajudar-lhe falar sobre o que você faz, ou gostá-los-ia 
de fazer, em seu tempo de lazer. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa gradite fare? Che åre i vostri 
hobby ed interessi? Qui imparate le parole, le frasi e le 
espressioni per aiutarli a parlare di che cosa fate, o vorreste fare, 
nel vostro tempo libero. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι επιθυμείτε να κάνετε; Ποια εre χόμπι και 
ενδιαφέροντά σας; Εδώ μαθαίνετε τις λέξεις, τις φράσεις 
και τις εκφράσεις για να σας βοηθάτε να μιλήσετε για αυτό που, ή 
θα επιθυμούσατε να κάνετε, στον ελεύθερο χρόνο σας. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους -
ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué  usted tiene gusto de hacer? ¿Qué 
åre sus manías e intereses? Aquí usted aprende palabras, 
frases y expresiones para ayudarle a hablar de lo que usted hace, o 
los quisiera hacer, en su tiempo libre. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
